author: Sue J

review: I like the Amazon fire stick because of the access to my Amazon prime movies and apps like Hulu. I gave it 4 stars because I expected an all one remote experience. I think that the remote should have quick buttons to maneuver to popular apps like Vudu. I was unhappy that Vudu wasn't available because I have so many movies on my account. Overall it loads faster then the Roku but lacks the apps most movies lovers like to view. Games are a plus and I'll eventually purchase the game controller.

review: I truly like this device, but it has not developed into love just yet. There are some issues with video playback - especially in Hulu Plus. However, I'm hoping that with some updates to address these issues, this device will be a five star rating, easy.
